Lots of haters. Lol. No better spectator sport in the whole world. Fact  They're only armour; shin pads. Not even a cup. The boots are not leather but paper thin top to create barefoot feeling and better traction on the ball. Ankles and calves have only socks over them. Everyone uses METAL studs on the bottom of their boots. Obviously every match is going to have small injuries that the players are able to walk off. Kinda like a snapshot in the skate while blocking a shot.   The sport does have a problem with the Uber dramatic. The World Cup has a problem with Officiating  The Italian team is the WORST lol
